abstract: xenia hotels & resorts inc plans quarterly dividend of $ 0.28 .
article: xenia hotels & resorts inc declared a quarterly dividend on friday , december 8th , zacks reports . investors of record on friday , december 29th will be given a dividend of 0.275 per share by the real estate investment trust on friday , january 12th . this represents a $ 1.10 annualized dividend and a yield of 4.98 % . the ex-dividend date of this dividend is thursday , december 28th . xenia hotels & resorts has a dividend payout ratio of 57.3 % meaning its dividend is sufficiently covered by earnings . equities research analysts expect xenia hotels & resorts to earn $ 2.01 per share next year , which means the company should continue to be able to cover its $ 1.10 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 54.7 % .

xenia hotels & resorts traded up $ 0.01 on friday , reaching $ 22.11 . the company had a trading volume of 358,396 shares , compared to its average volume of 541,241 . xenia hotels & resorts has a 1 year low of $ 16.21 and a 1 year high of $ 22.76 . the company has a current ratio of 6.86 , a quick ratio of 6.86 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.78 . the firm has a market cap of $ 2,358.73 , a price-to-earnings ratio of 10.63 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 2.31 and a beta of 0.80 .

xenia hotels & resorts last posted its quarterly earnings results on tuesday , november 7th . the real estate investment trust reported $ 0.50 earnings per share for the quarter , beating analysts ' consensus estimates of $ 0.12 by $ 0.38 . the company had revenue of $ 223.28 million for the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 219.67 million . xenia hotels & resorts had a return on equity of 8.34 % and a net margin of 15.23 % . xenia hotels & resorts 's revenue for the quarter was down 4.6 % compared to the same quarter last year .
